#text=My classmates and I needed to plant a nice tree in front of the new school building that was just built this year .
#text=I wanted to find a tree that would last a quite long time .
#text=We found a nice pine tree that was just large enough to be a foot .
#text=We dug a nice hole in the ground , and insured the soil was the proper type to accept a tree of this size .
#text=It had to be nice and soft , and in a safe location where kids wo n't trample over it .
#text=I dug the hole about 4 '' '' deep and insured it was wide enough for the tree .
#text=We planted the tree and began to fill in the surrounding area of it with soil to make sure it would hold in place as perfect as possible .
#text=The tree looked perfect and was ready to withstand the first school year outside the new building .
